instructions: Image titled Set a Bookmark Shortcut in Your Home Screen on Android Step 1 1 Navigate to your Android web browser. Locate the icon that looks like a globe and tap on it to open. Image titled Set a Bookmark Shortcut in Your Home Screen on Android Step 2 2 Go to your website of choice. Enter the name of the website in the text bar and press "Enter" or "Go." Image titled Set a Bookmark Shortcut in Your Home Screen on Android Step 3 3 Tap on the Create Bookmark icon. This is the star outline icon to the right of the URL bar. An info box should appear asking you to name the bookmark and where you want it saved. Image titled Set a Bookmark Shortcut in Your Home Screen on Android Step 4 4 Tap on the drop-down menu. It can be found on the "Add To" choice. Image titled Set a Bookmark Shortcut in Your Home Screen on Android Step 5 5 Tap "Home Screen. " You should now see your new bookmark on your home screen. Advertisement

Image titled Set a Bookmark Shortcut in Your Home Screen on Android Step 6 1 Launch the Dolphin Browser. You can tap on the browser s icon from your home screen. Alternatively, you can find the Dolphin Browser app icon in your app drawer. Image titled Set a Bookmark Shortcut in Your Home Screen on Android Step 7 2 Tap on the Add Bookmark icon. This is represented by the star icon on the left of the URL bar. Image titled Set a Bookmark Shortcut in Your Home Screen on Android Step 8 3 Navigate and hold on one bookmark you want to save on your home screen. Image titled Set a Bookmark Shortcut in Your Home Screen on Android Step 9 4 Tap "Add shortcut to Home. . " Done! A shortcut to the website will be added to your home screen. Advertisement

Image titled Set a Bookmark Shortcut in Your Home Screen on Android Step 10 1 Launch Google Chrome browser app. Just tap on the Google Chrome icon on your home screen or app drawer. Image titled Set a Bookmark Shortcut in Your Home Screen on Android Step 11 2 Go to the website you want to save. Enter the website in the search/text bar and press "Enter." Image titled Set a Bookmark Shortcut in Your Home Screen on Android Step 12 3 Tap on the Menu button. The looks of the Menu button will depend on your device; usually it's an app button that looks like three horizontal lines stacked on each other, or it could be accessed through a hardware button on your phone. Image titled Set a Bookmark Shortcut in Your Home Screen on Android Step 13 4 Tap "Add to Home Screen. " Done! A shortcut to the website will be added to your home screen. Advertisement

Image titled Set a Bookmark Shortcut in Your Home Screen on Android Step 14 1 Launch your Mozilla Firefox app. Just tap on the Firefox icon on your home screen or app drawer. Image titled Set a Bookmark Shortcut in Your Home Screen on Android Step 15 2 Go to the site you want to save on your home screen. Enter the name of the website and press "Enter." Image titled Set a Bookmark Shortcut in Your Home Screen on Android Step 16 3 Tap and hold the address bar. Some options will appear. Image titled Set a Bookmark Shortcut in Your Home Screen on Android Step 17 4 Choose "Add to Home Screen. " Done! A shortcut to the website will be added to your home screen. Advertisement
